text: Hello I'm trying to get the --remove to work with the watch command so I can delete modules, templates, etc locally and have it delete them in HubSpot but I can't seem to get it to work. Can anyone see something wrong with my syntax "*hs watch --remove=~XXXXXX~ p1p-2021-theme-v2 p1p-2021-theme-v2*"?

remove is just a flag. It doesnt need any value associated with it
`*hs watch --removeÂ p1p-2021-theme-v2 p1p-2021-theme-v2*"`
Lol totally missed that one thank you.
